downloadDescription: The content you requested has already retired. It's available to download on this page.
detailsSection: Internet Explorer Technical Articles content, including Deploying Windows Live Toolbars in the Enterprise, Solutions for Virtualizing Internet Explorer, Deploying Pinned Websites, and Internet Explorer 9 Preinstallation Techniques. This content has been updated and can be found with the appropriate version of the IE.
systemRequirementsSection: Deploying Windows Live Toolbars in the Enterprise and Solutions for Virtualizing Internet Explorer (IE6 and IE7 on Windows 7), Deploying Pinned Websites (IE9 on Windows 7), and Internet Explorer 9 Preinstallation Techniques (IE9 on Windows 7 or Windows Server 2008 R2)
installInstructionSection:
1. The download is a pdf file. To start the download, click Download.
  2. If the File Download dialog box appears, do one of the following:
    • To start the download immediately, click Open.
    • To copy the download to your computer to view at a later time, click Save.
